mapper.select: SELECT oftd.template_detail_id, oftd.carrier_id, oc.carrier_name carrier_name, oc.carrier_type_code carrier_type_code, oftd.region_id, oftd.first_piece_weight, oftd.first_price, oftd.next_piece_weight, oftd.next_price, oftd.template_id, oftd.is_default, oftd.object_version_number, oftd.creation_date, oftd.created_by, oftd.last_updated_by, oftd.last_update_date FROM o2md_freight_template_detail oftd LEFT JOIN o2md_carrier oc ON oftd.carrier_id=oc.carrier_id WHERE oftd.region_id IS NULL AND oftd.template_id= #{templateId}

SELECT oftd.template_detail_id, oftd.carrier_id, oc.carrier_name carrier_name, oc.carrier_type_code carrier_type_code, oftd.region_id, ore.region_name region_name, oftd.first_piece_weight, oftd.first_price, oftd.next_piece_weight, oftd.next_price, oftd.template_id, oftd.is_default, oftd.object_version_number, oftd.creation_date, oftd.created_by, oftd.last_updated_by, oftd.last_update_date FROM o2md_freight_template_detail oftd LEFT JOIN o2md_carrier oc ON oftd.carrier_id=oc.carrier_id LEFT JOIN o2md_region ore ON oftd.region_id=ore.region_id WHERE oftd.region_id IS NOT NULL AND oftd.template_id= #{templateId}

SELECT oftd.template_detail_id, oftd.carrier_id, oftd.region_id, oftd.first_piece_weight, oftd.first_price, oftd.next_piece_weight, oftd.next_price, oftd.template_id, oftd.is_default, oftd.object_version_number, oftd.creation_date, oftd.created_by, oftd.last_updated_by, oftd.last_update_date FROM o2md_freight_template_detail oftd WHERE oftd.template_id= #{templateId}

SELECT oftd.template_detail_id, oftd.carrier_id, oftd.region_id, oftd.first_piece_weight, oftd.first_price, oftd.next_piece_weight, oftd.next_price, oftd.template_id, oftd.is_default, oftd.object_version_number, oftd.creation_date, oftd.created_by, oftd.last_updated_by, oftd.last_update_date FROM o2md_freight_template_detail oftd WHERE oftd.region_id IS NULL AND oftd.is_default=1 AND oftd.template_id=#{templateId} AND oftd.template_detail_id!=#{templateDetailId}
